B: Issued at 2.30 p.m. 21 October 2023, valid until 2.30 p.m. 22 October 2023

WW/O/23/10/21/01 ulletin No: 02: For Multi-day boats in the southwest and adjoining South-East Bay of Bengal

B: The low-pressure area over the southwest Bay of Bengal is likely to intensify into a depression during
next 24hrs, it is likely to move Northeastwards towards Bangladesh coast away from Sri Lanka.
